Justice, Administration of

metadata.title: Esprit des édits, enregistrés militairement au parlement de Grenoble le 10 mai 1788.
metadata.creator: Barnave, Antoine, 1761-1793.
Barnave, Antoine, 1761-1793
metadata.description: Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, I, 1742
This edition signed A, A, A2 on leaves [1]-[3]; another 19 p. edition exists without signatures

Assemblée provinciale -- Prérogation du deuxieme vingtieme, & extension -- Conversion de la Corvée en une prestation en argent -- Rachat des offices municipaux -- Prodécure criminelle -- Suppression de tribunaux, réductions d'offices, administration de la justice, rétablissement de la cour pléniere, vacances
metadata.notes: Title page located on cover page. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged pages and cover. Skewed text.
